verses.verse: וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after יָשַׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> ya-Shav sat דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid Now it came to pass as David בְּבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-To; in his house וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִ֜יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid that David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to נָתָ֣ן <S%H5416><s%> na-Tan to Nathan הַנָּבִ֗יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi, the prophet הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אָנֹכִ֤י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I יוֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev Lo I dwell בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in an house הָֽאֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H729><s%> ha-'a-ra-Zim, made of cedar וַאֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> va-'a-Ron but the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> be-rit- of the covenant יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat is under יְרִיעֽוֹת׃ <S%H3407><s%> ye-ri-'ot. [remaineth] under curtains

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said נָתָן֙ <S%H5416><s%> na-Tan Then Nathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, unto David כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher is in בִּֽלְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> bil-va-ve-Cha all that [is] in thine heart עֲשֵׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Seh; Do כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him for God עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach. with ס sa-Mek

וַֽיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> bal-Lay-lah And it came to pass the same night הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu; the same וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- that the word אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to נָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> na-Tan came to Nathan לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

לֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> lech Go וְאָמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and tell אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David עַבְדִּ֔י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Di, my servant כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you תִּבְנֶה־ <S%H1129><s%> tiv-neh- Thou shalt not build לִּ֥י li הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit me an house לָשָֽׁבֶת׃ <S%H3427><s%> la-Sha-vet. to dwell in

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo have not יָשַׁ֙בְתִּי֙ <S%H3427><s%> ya-Shav-ti For I have not dwelt in בְּבַ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> be-Va-yit, an house מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- since הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, since the day אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher i הֶעֱלֵ֙יתִי֙ <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-Lei-ti that I brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; to this וָֽאֶהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> va-'eh-Yeh have gone מֵאֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> me-'O-hel but have gone from tent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel to tent וּמִמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> u-mi-mish-Kan. and from [one] tabernacle

בְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- where הִתְהַלַּכְתִּי֮ <S%H1980><s%> hit-hal-lach-Ti Wheresoever I have walked בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El with all Israel הֲדָבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> ha-da-Var I a word דִּבַּ֗רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti, spake אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with אַחַד֙ <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chad to any שֹׁפְטֵ֣י <S%H8199><s%> sho-fe-Tei of the judges יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom צִוִּ֛יתִי <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vi-ti whom I commanded לִרְע֥וֹת <S%H7462><s%> lir-'ot to feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi my people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying לָ֛מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not בְנִיתֶ֥ם <S%H1129><s%> ve-ni-Tem Why have ye not built לִ֖י li בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit me an house אֲרָזִֽים׃ <S%H729><s%> 'a-ra-Zim. made of cedar

וְ֠עַתָּה <S%H6258><s%> Ve-'at-tah Now כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- thus תֹאמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> to-Mar Now therefore thus shalt thou say לְעַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> le-'av-Di unto my servant לְדָוִ֗יד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid, David ס sa-Mek כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I לְקַחְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H3947><s%> le-kach-Ti-cha I took מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַנָּוֶ֔ה <S%H5116><s%> han-na-Veh, thee from the sheepcote מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei [even] from following הַצֹּ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon; the sheep לִהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot become נָגִ֔יד <S%H5057><s%> na-Gid, that thou shouldest be ruler עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al over עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi over my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel

וָֽאֶהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> va-'eh-Yeh have been עִמְּךָ֗ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-me-Cha, with בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who הָלַ֔כְתָּ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Lach-ta, And I have been with thee whithersoever thou hast walked וָאַכְרִ֥ית <S%H3772><s%> va-'ach-Rit and have cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אוֹיְבֶ֖יךָ <S%H341><s%> 'oy-Vei-cha all thine enemies מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pa-Nei-cha; from before וְעָשִׂ֤יתִֽי <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ti thee and have made לְךָ֙ le-Cha שֵׁ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> Shem, thee a name כְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ke-Shem like the name הַגְּדוֹלִ֖ים <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lim of the great men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. that [are] in the earth

וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ti Also I will ordain מָ֠קוֹם <S%H4725><s%> Ma-kom a place לְעַמִּ֨י <S%H5971><s%> le-'am-Mi for my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel וּנְטַעְתִּ֙יהוּ֙ <S%H5193><s%> u-ne-ta'-Ti-hu and will plant וְשָׁכַ֣ן <S%H7931><s%> ve-sha-Chan them and they shall dwell תַּחְתָּ֔יו <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tav, place וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יִרְגַּ֖ז <S%H7264><s%> yir-Gaz in their place and shall be moved ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od; again וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not יוֹסִ֤יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> yo-Si-fu them any more בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- no more neither shall the children עַוְלָה֙ <S%H5766><s%> 'av-Lah of wickedness לְבַלֹּת֔וֹ <S%H1086><s%> le-val-lo-To, waste כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher as בָּרִאשׁוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H7223><s%> ba-ri-sho-Nah. as at the beginning

וּלְמִיָּמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> u-le-mi-ya-Mim, And since the time אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher i צִוִּ֤יתִי <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vi-ti that I commanded שֹֽׁפְטִים֙ <S%H8199><s%> sho-fe-Tim judges עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi [to be] over my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel וְהִכְנַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3665><s%> ve-hich-Na'-ti Moreover I will subdue אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אוֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <S%H341><s%> 'oy-Vei-cha; all thine enemies וָאַגִּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> va-'ag-Gid Furthermore I tell לָ֔ךְ Lach, וּבַ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> u-Va-yit thee an house יִֽבְנֶה־ <S%H1129><s%> yiv-neh- will build לְּךָ֥ le-Cha יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. thee that the LORD

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- When מָלְא֤וּ <S%H4390><s%> mal-'U be expired יָמֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mei-cha And it shall come to pass when thy days לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet go עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-cha, [to be] with thy fathers וַהֲקִֽימוֹתִ֤י <S%H6965><s%> va-ha-ki-mo-Ti that I will raise up אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זַרְעֲךָ֙ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'a-Cha thy seed אַחֲרֶ֔יךָ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei-cha, after אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh will be of מִבָּנֶ֑יךָ <S%H1121><s%> mib-ba-Nei-cha; thee which shall be of thy sons וַהֲכִינוֹתִ֖י <S%H3559><s%> va-ha-chi-no-Ti and I will establish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4438><s%> mal-chu-To. his kingdom

ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He יִבְנֶה־ <S%H1129><s%> yiv-neh- He shall build לִּ֖י li בָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> Ba-yit; me an house וְכֹנַנְתִּ֥י <S%H3559><s%> ve-cho-nan-Ti and I will stablish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כִּסְא֖וֹ <S%H3678><s%> kis-'O his throne עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. ever

אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I אֶֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> 'eh-yeh- become לּ֣וֹ lo לְאָ֔ב <S%H1><s%> le-'Av, I will be his father וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- become לִּ֣י li לְבֵ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> le-Ven; and he shall be my son וְחַסְדִּי֙ <S%H2617><s%> ve-chas-Di my mercy לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- and I will not אָסִ֣יר <S%H5493><s%> 'a-Sir away מֵֽעִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> me-'im-Mo, with כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher who הֲסִיר֔וֹתִי <S%H5493><s%> ha-si-Ro-ti, from him as I took מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> me-'a-Sher who הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha. [it] from [him] that was before

וְהַֽעֲמַדְתִּ֛יהוּ <S%H5975><s%> ve-ha-'a-mad-Ti-hu But I will settle בְּבֵיתִ֥י <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-Ti him in mine house וּבְמַלְכוּתִ֖י <S%H4438><s%> u-ve-mal-chu-Ti and in my kingdom עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- for הָעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> ha-'o-Lam; for ever וְכִסְא֕וֹ <S%H3678><s%> ve-chis-'O and his throne יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become נָכ֖וֹן <S%H3559><s%> na-Chon shall be established עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. evermore

כְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol to all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim According to all these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these וּכְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> u-che-Chol to all הֶחָז֣וֹן <S%H2377><s%> he-cha-Zon and according to all this vision הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber speak נָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> na-Tan so did Nathan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid. unto David פ Peh

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the king דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And David וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev and sat לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, and said מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who אֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Who [am] I O LORD אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> u-Mi and what בֵיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> vei-Ti, and what [is] mine house כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki that הֲבִיאֹתַ֖נִי <S%H935><s%> ha-vi-'o-Ta-ni that thou hast brought עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against הֲלֹֽם׃ <S%H1988><s%> ha-Lom. this

וַתִּקְטַ֨ן <S%H6994><s%> vat-tik-Tan And [yet] this was a small thing זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> zot in בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha in thine eyes אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, O God וַתְּדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vat-te-dab-Ber for thou hast [also] spoken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- house עַבְדְּךָ֖ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-de-Cha of thy servant's לְמֵרָח֑וֹק <S%H7350><s%> le-me-ra-Chok; for a great while to come וּרְאִיתַ֗נִי <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'i-Ta-ni, and hast regarded כְּת֧וֹר <S%H8448><s%> ke-Tor me according to the estate הָאָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam of a man הַֽמַּעֲלָ֖ה <S%H4609><s%> ham-ma-'a-Lah of high degree יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. God
